_header: When Christs faith young was and new
Subjects: Dorothy, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Dorothy in Bokenam’s Lives of Saints

BLAru327.First Lines:
Whan crystys feyth yung was & neweAnd not fully rotyd
                    stedefastly…
BLAru327.Last Lines:
…Was of þis lyf made þis translacyounAmen mercy
                    ihesu an gramercy
BLAru327.Attributed Author:
Translated into englys be a doctor of dyuyinte clepyd Osbern
                    Bokenam…Wrytyn in Cambryge by hys sonn ffrer Thomas Burgh (index, f.
                    193)
BLAru327.Attributed Title:
The lyf of seynt Dorothye (rubric, f. 87) The lyf of seynt Dorothye (index,
                    f. 193)

BLAdd36983.First Lines:
Whan Crystys ffeyth ȝong was and neweAnd not fully Rooted
                    Stedfastely…
BLAdd36983.Last Lines:
…And forto spekyn of bodyly bewteSche passid all maydens of
                    ȝþat contre
